snippet.title: FixFox Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: FixFox is a sci-fi adventure about a fox repairing quirky machines with unconventional tools, sharing cozy meals with kind robots along the way. "Repair friendly machines with unconventional tools like coins, bandages, glowy bananas… anything really!" https://store.steampowered.com/app/1696220/FixFox/ #indiegames #pixelart #cozygames
